channel.title: Dueling
channel.description:
Well im trying to add dueling and so far I have everything I need except for the main part.
I need to make it so you can only attack your certian person. This would also help for NPCs for quests. Im getting far with dueling just need this main part. If you want my msn pm me. Plz this will help me greatly
